verses.text: \w It|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* good thing \w to|strong="H3117"\w* give thanks \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w sing|strong="H7892"\w* \w praises|strong="H7892"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3117"\w* name, Most High,

\w to|strong="H3068"\w* proclaim \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w loving|strong="H2896"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w every|strong="H3068"\w* night,

\w with|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* ten-stringed lute, \w with|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* harp, \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w with|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* melody \w of|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H5046"\w* lyre.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H5921"\w* made \w me|strong="H5921"\w* glad \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* work. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will triumph \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w works|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hands.

\w How|strong="H3588"\w* great \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*! \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* thoughts \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w very|strong="H8055"\w* deep.
\w A|strong="H3068"\w* senseless man doesn’t know, neither \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fool understand \w this|strong="H3068"\w*:

though \w the|strong="H3045"\w* wicked spring up as \w the|strong="H3045"\w* grass, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* evildoers flourish, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* destroyed forever.
\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H7563"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* high \w forever|strong="H5704"\w* \w more|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* behold, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* behold, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* enemies \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* perish. \w All|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* evildoers \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* scattered.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* exalted \w my|strong="H3605"\w* horn \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wild ox. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* anointed \w with|strong="H3068"\w* fresh oil.

\w My|strong="H7311"\w* eye has also seen \w my|strong="H7311"\w* enemies. \w My|strong="H7311"\w* ears have heard \w of|strong="H7161"\w* \w the|strong="H7311"\w* wicked enemies who \w rise|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* against \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H5869"\w* flourish \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* palm tree. \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* grow \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cedar \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Lebanon.

They \w are|strong="H6662"\w* planted \w in|strong="H6662"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s house. They \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w* \w in|strong="H6662"\w* our God’s courts.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* still produce fruit \w in|strong="H3068"\w* old age. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* full \w of|strong="H1004"\w* sap \w and|strong="H3068"\w* green,

\w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w show|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* upright. He \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H5750"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H1961"\w* unrighteousness \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*.
